thread.section_title: iDriveSafely Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of iDriveSafely | www.idrivesafely.com | 4 of 110
thread.title: SARAH

author: SARAH
title: SARAH
text: This was a great online course but when it came to take the behind the wheel training, they offered a $20 discount that came with our completed course which is a main reason we choose this program. However, they do not have anyone to give the behind the wheel training anywhere within a 2 hr. radius of us and we live in Fresno, CA, a major metropolitan area, so just double check that first if that is important to you. The course was good online though.
